physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Baseline serum lipid profile revealed LDL 128 mg/dL, HDL 27 mg/dL, and triglycerides 92 mg/dL. After treatment with simvastatin 40 mg and niacin 1000 mg daily, the lipid profile improved to LDL 78 mg/dL, HDL 43 mg/dL, and triglycerides 60 mg/dL.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient's lipid profile showed improvement over time with HDL levels increasing from 27 mg/dL to 43 mg/dL.
